plot outline: Malhar is heads the Govinda Troupe of Jai Bajrang Mandal and hopes to break the record of previous year held by Jai Ekta Mandal.Raghu heads Jai Ekta Mandal and is proud no one can break its record.Raghu works as henchmen to Madhubhai trying his hands at politics.While Malhar and Jai Bajrang catch the eye of politician Vishwasrao and gets chance to proves their skills.Thus creating rivalry between two Mandal's.
title: Kanha
plot: The festival of Dahi Handi isn't just about fun and games; its political complexity is explored in this movie.

Malhar is heads the Govinda Troupe of Jai Bajrang Mandal and hopes to break the record of previous year held by Jai Ekta Mandal.Raghu heads Jai Ekta Mandal and is proud no one can break its record.Raghu works as henchmen to Madhubhai trying his hands at politics.While Malhar and Jai Bajrang catch the eye of politician Vishwasrao and gets chance to proves their skills.Thus creating rivalry between two Mandal's.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
